title: CLI JSON Schema
description: CLI JSON Schema for clap-rs YAML

author.description: Sets a string of author(s) that will be displayed to the user when they request the help message

after_help.description: Adds additional help information to be displayed at the end of the auto-generated help

before_help.description: Adds additional help information to be displayed prior to the auto-generated help

about.description: short help text of the argument

allow_hyphen_values.description: Allows values which start with a leading hyphen (-)

default_value.description: Specifies the value of the argument when not specified at runtime

hidden.description: Hides an argument from help message output. NOTE: This does not hide the argument from usage.

index.description: Specifies the index of a positional argument starting at 1.

long.description: Sets the long version of the argument without the preceding --

multiple.description: Specifies that the argument may have an unknown number of multiple values. Without any other settings, this argument may appear only once.

required.description: Specifies that the argument is required by default

short.description: Sets the short version of the argument without the preceding -

takes_value.description: Specifies that the argument takes a value at run time

use_delimiter.description: Specifies that an argument should allow grouping of multiple values via a delimiter, default is comma ,

value_hint.description: Sets a hint about the type of the value for shell completions

value_name.description: Specifies the name for value of option or positional arguments inside of help documentation

about.description: Sets a string describing what the command does

after_help.description: Adds additional help information to be displayed at the end of the auto-generated help

aliases.description: adds a multiple aliases for command

args.description: Adds multiple arguments to the list of valid possibilities.

author.description: Sets a string of author(s) that will be displayed to the user when they request the help message

version.description: Sets a string of the version number to be displayed when displaying the short format version message
